snippet.title: Hellpoint - Date Announce Trailer | Switch PS4 Xbox One Steam
snippet.description:
Steam, #NintendoSwitch, PS4, Xbox One - on April 16! 

Wishlist the game https://store.steampowered.com/app/628670/Hellpoint/
Learn more about Hellpoint at https://playhellpoint.com
Join the official Discord channel https://discord.me/hellpoint

Hellpoint is an intense action RPG taking place on Irid Novo, a derelict space station soaked in an intoxicating dark sci fi atmosphere. Fight dreadful creatures, face the Cosmic Gods and unravel their twisted story. Should the challenge be too great, play with a friend in local or online coop.

#Hellpoint #SciFi #ActionRPG #SoulsLike
